# expirationDate

**Type Property**

The time and date that you want the system to remove the pasteboard items from the pasteboard.

## Declaration

```swift
static let expirationDate: UIPasteboard.OptionsKey
```

## Discussion

Specify the date and time as an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSDate] value.

## Constants

- **localOnly**: A Boolean value that specifies that the pasteboard items should not be available to other devices through the Handoff feature.

items.description: A Boolean value that specifies that the pasteboard items should not be available to other devices through the Handoff feature.
items.name: localOnly

title: expirationDate
